contents.text: Welcome to Notion, the San Francisco-based platform that fuses all your work apps into one seamless team workspace.
For sales and product demos, press 1.
For enterprise pricing and team packages, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Get details on enterprise pricing and team package options
I’d like to discuss enterprise team pricing packages for my organization.
I'm evaluating enterprise licensing and team package options for our organization.
I’d like to know the cost and options for a team or enterprise plan to use Notion with my community group.
I need detailed enterprise pricing information for Notion team subscriptions.

contents.text: For a one-on-one product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a product expert.

navigationGoals: Book a one-on-one Notion product demonstration with an expert
I want to schedule a one-on-one product demo to explore Notion’s features.
I'd like to schedule a one-on-one technical demo of Notion's advanced features.
Can someone walk me through a one-on-one demo so I can learn how to use Notion step by step?
I’d like to schedule a one-on-one Notion demo to explore advanced features.

contents.text: For customer support and account management, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue I’m encountering in my workspace
I’m experiencing a technical issue syncing my workspace and need help troubleshooting.
I need help troubleshooting our workspace API integration errors.
My Notion notes aren’t syncing between my computer and tablet; I need help fixing that issue.
I’m experiencing syncing errors in Notion and need technical help to resolve them.

contents.text: For account, billing, and subscription inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Ask about a billing charge and modify my subscription plan
I need to update my billing information and review my subscription invoice.
I want to update our subscription plan and payment method.
I was billed twice last month and need to sort out my subscription charges and get a refund.
I want to review my latest subscription invoice and update my billing information.
